AT.name: Mega Man™ 7
AT.description: Dr. Wily ist endlich hinter Gittern, aber für Mega Man ist der Kampf noch lange nicht vorbei. Der Notfallplan von Wily wird aktiviert: Vier böse Roboter greifen die Stadt an. Eine perfekte Ablenkung für einen Gefängnisausbruch. Mega Man und Rush sind Wily schon bald auf den Fersen, genau wie Bass und Treble: ein weiteres Duo bestehend aus einem Roboter und einem Hund. Wer sind diese geheimnisvollen Neulinge und kann man ihnen trauen? Springe und ballere durch actionreiche Level, stell dich bösartigen neuen Bossgegnern, entdecke versteckte Items und Power-Ups und schicke Dr. Wily zurück hinter Gitter! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

CY.name: Mega Man™ 7
CY.description: Dr. Wily has finally been imprisoned but Mega Man’s fight is far from over. Wily’s backup plan springs into action: four evil robots attack the city; the perfect distraction to make his escape. Mega Man and Rush are soon on Wily’s trail, and so are Bass and Treble: another robot and canine companion. Who are these mysterious newcomers, and can they be trusted? Jump and blast your way through action-packed levels, face off against fiendish new bosses, discover hidden items and power ups, and send Dr. Wily back behind bars! This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Mega Man™ 7
BE.description: Dr Wily a enfin été capturé, mais le combat de Mega Man est loin d'être terminé. La revanche de Wily est lancée : quatre robots diaboliques ont attaqué la ville, la diversion parfaite qui lui a permis de fuir. Mega Man et Rush sont bientôt sur les traces de Wily, tout comme Bass et Treble : un autre robot et un chien. Qui sont ces nouveaux compagnons ? Pouvons-nous leur faire confiance ? Frayez-vous un chemin et faites tout exploser dans ces niveaux remplis d'action. Affrontez de nouveaux boss monstrueux, découvrez des objets cachés et des améliorations, et renvoyez Dr Wily derrière les barreaux ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

AU.name: Mega Man™ 7
AU.description: Dr. Wily has finally been imprisoned but Mega Man’s fight is far from over. Wily’s backup plan springs into action: four evil robots attack the city; the perfect distraction to make his escape. Mega Man and Rush are soon on Wily’s trail, and so are Bass and Treble: another robot and canine companion. Who are these mysterious newcomers, and can they be trusted? Jump and blast your way through action-packed levels, face off against fiendish new bosses, discover hidden items and power ups, and send Dr. Wily back behind bars! This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: MEGA MAN™ 7
CA.description: Dr. Wily knew that one day his plans would fail him. But as the world cheered at his capture, the nefarious scientist stowed four robots in his lab, set to activate after six months of no communication from their master. Now the robots have started a rampage in the city, which serves as the perfect distraction for Dr. Wily to make his getaway. But Mega Man and his trusty sidekick, Rush, are hot on his trail...and so are Bass and Treble? Who are these mysterious companions? Jump, power up, and blast your way through robotic enemies, and send Dr. Wily back to prison where he belongs!

BR.name: MEGA MAN™ 7
BR.description: Dr. Wily sabia que um dia os seus planos iriam falhar. Mas enquanto o mundo celebrava a sua prisão, o desonesto cientista tinha quatro robôs guardados em seu laboratório, configurados para serem ativados após seis meses sem comunicação com seu mestre. Os robôs começaram a fazer confusão na cidade, o que serviu como a distração perfeita para que Dr. Wily pudesse fugir da prisão. Mas Mega Man e o seu parceiro de confiança, Rush, estão seguindo o seu rastro bem de perto... assim como Bass e Treble? Quem são esses acompanhantes misteriosos? Pule, use power-ups e abra caminho ao passar por robôs inimigos para mandar Dr. Wily de volta ao seu lugar, a prisão!

BG.name: Mega Man™ 7
BG.description: Dr. Wily has finally been imprisoned but Mega Man’s fight is far from over. Jump and blast your way through action-packed levels, face off against fiendish new bosses, discover hidden items and power ups, and send Dr. Wily back behind bars! GR.name: Mega Man™ 7
GR.description: Dr. Wily has finally been imprisoned but Mega Man’s fight is far from over. Wily’s backup plan springs into action: four evil robots attack the city; the perfect distraction to make his escape. Mega Man and Rush are soon on Wily’s trail, and so are Bass and Treble: another robot and canine companion. Who are these mysterious newcomers, and can they be trusted? Jump and blast your way through action-packed levels, face off against fiendish new bosses, discover hidden items and power ups, and send Dr. Wily back behind bars! This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: MEGA MAN™ 7
MX.description: El Dr. Wily sabía que sus planes fracasarían pero mientras el mundo festejaba su captura este nefasto científico almacenó cuatro robots en su laboratorio y los ha programado para activarse después de seis meses sin comunicarse con su amo. Cuando los robots empiezan a destruir la ciudad es la perfecta distracción para que el Dr. Wily ejecute su gran escape. Pero Mega Man y su confiable compañero Rush están detrás de su rastro… ¿y al parecer también lo están Bass y Treble? ¿Quiénes son estos aliados? Salta, obtén mejoras y ábrete camino a través de robóticos enemigos y ¡envía al Dr. Wily de vuelta a la prisión donde pertenece!

NL.name: Mega Man™ 7
NL.description: Dr. Wily is eindelijk is het gevang beland, maar Mega Man kan niet op zijn lauweren rusten. Wily’s plan om vier kwaadaardige robots op de stad los te laten wordt geactiveerd en creëert de perfecte afleiding voor Wily om te ontsnappen. Mega Man en Rush komen Wily snel op het spoor, en zij zijn niet de enige. Robot Bass en hond Treble verschijnen op het toneel. Wie zijn zij, en belangrijker… zijn ze te vertrouwen? Spring en schiet je een weg door de actievolle levels, versla nieuwe eindbazen, ontdek verborgen voorwerpen en plaats Dr. Wily terug achter de tralies! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

HR.name: Mega Man™ 7
HR.description: Dr. Wily has finally been imprisoned but Mega Man’s fight is far from over. Wily’s backup plan springs into action: four evil robots attack the city; the perfect distraction to make his escape. Mega Man and Rush are soon on Wily’s trail, and so are Bass and Treble: another robot and canine companion. Who are these mysterious newcomers, and can they be trusted? Jump and blast your way through action-packed levels, face off against fiendish new bosses, discover hidden items and power ups, and send Dr. Wily back behind bars! This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Mega Man™ 7
IT.description: Il Dr. Wily è stato finalmente sbattuto dietro le sbarre, ma la missione di Mega Man non è finita. Il malvagio antagonista del nostro eroe aveva astutamente architettato un piano: quattro temibili robot erano pronti a entrare in azione seminando il panico in città, il diversivo perfetto per permettergli di evadere. Mega Man e Rush si mettono subito sulle sue tracce, insieme a Bass e al suo fedele compagno Treble. Ma chi sono questi due nuovi cibernetici aiutanti? E soprattutto, Mega Man può davvero fidarsi di loro? Fatti strada saltando per tanti livelli adrenalinici e sbaraglia nuovi perfidi boss con l'aiuto di potenziamenti e oggetti nascosti per fermare il Dr. Wily una volta per tutte! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

CH.name: Mega Man™ 7
CH.description: Dr. Wily ist endlich hinter Gittern, aber für Mega Man ist der Kampf noch lange nicht vorbei. Der Notfallplan von Wily wird aktiviert: Vier böse Roboter greifen die Stadt an. Eine perfekte Ablenkung für einen Gefängnisausbruch. Mega Man und Rush sind Wily schon bald auf den Fersen, genau wie Bass und Treble: ein weiteres Duo bestehend aus einem Roboter und einem Hund. Wer sind diese geheimnisvollen Neulinge und kann man ihnen trauen? Springe und ballere durch actionreiche Level, stell dich bösartigen neuen Bossgegnern, entdecke versteckte Items und Power-Ups und schicke Dr. Wily zurück hinter Gitter! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

GB.name: Mega Man™ 7
GB.description: Dr. Wily has finally been imprisoned but Mega Man’s fight is far from over. Wily’s backup plan springs into action: four evil robots attack the city; the perfect distraction to make his escape. Mega Man and Rush are soon on Wily’s trail, and so are Bass and Treble: another robot and canine companion. Who are these mysterious newcomers, and can they be trusted? Jump and blast your way through action-packed levels, face off against fiendish new bosses, discover hidden items and power ups, and send Dr. Wily back behind bars! This is the US version of the game.

ES.name: Mega Man™ 7
ES.description: El Dr. Wily está por fin entre rejas, pero Mega Man aún no puede respirar tranquilo... Wily ha preparado una maniobra de distracción perfecta: mientras cuatro despiadados robots atacan la ciudad, aprovecha el caos para escapar de prisión. Mega Man y Rush enseguida se ponen manos a la obra para dar con él. Bass y Treble, un robot y su compañero cuadrúpedo, también comienzan a seguirle el rastro. Pero ¿quiénes son estos recién llegados? Y, sobre todo, ¿son de fiar? Salta y ábrete paso por niveles trepidantes, enfréntate a nuevos y temibles jefes, descubre objetos y mejoras ocultos, ¡y devuelve al Dr. Wily al lugar del que nunca debió salir! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

SE.name: Mega Man™ 7
SE.description: Dr. Wily has finally been imprisoned but Mega Man’s fight is far from over. Wily’s backup plan springs into action: four evil robots attack the city; the perfect distraction to make his escape. Mega Man and Rush are soon on Wily’s trail, and so are Bass and Treble: another robot and canine companion. Who are these mysterious newcomers, and can they be trusted? Jump and blast your way through action-packed levels, face off against fiendish new bosses, discover hidden items and power ups, and send Dr. Wily back behind bars! This is the US version of the game.

SI.name: Mega Man™ 7
SI.description: Dr. Wily has finally been imprisoned but Mega Man’s fight is far from over. Wily’s backup plan springs into action: four evil robots attack the city; the perfect distraction to make his escape. Mega Man and Rush are soon on Wily’s trail, and so are Bass and Treble: another robot and canine companion. Who are these mysterious newcomers, and can they be trusted? Jump and blast your way through action-packed levels, face off against fiendish new bosses, discover hidden items and power ups, and send Dr. Wily back behind bars! This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mega Man™ 7
PT.description: Dr. Wily encontra-se finalmente preso, no entanto Mega Man ainda não pode respirar de alívio. Wily preparou uma manobra de diversão perfeita: enquanto quatro maléficos robôs atacam a cidade, este aproveita para fugir da prisão. Mega Man e Rush partem rapidamente ao seu encalço, assim como, Bass e Treble, outro robô e o seu companheiro canino. Mas quem são estes misteriosos recém-chegados? E será que são de confiança? Salta e abre caminho através de níveis repletos de ação, enfrenta novos e temíveis bosses, descobre objetos e power-ups escondidos e coloca Dr. Wily outra vez atrás das grades! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mega Man™ 7
RU.description: Dr. Wily наконец-то заточен в тюрьму, но приключения Mega Man на этом не заканчиваются. У злобного доктора наготове запасной план: во время внезапного нападения четырех агрессивных роботов на город ему удается сбежать! Преследуя Wily, Mega Man и Rush встречают еще одну парочку: робота Bass и его четвероногого спутника Treble. Можно ли доверять новым знакомым? Вас ждут захватывающие уровни, коварные боссы, скрытые предметы и усиления. Разгромите механических противников и верните Dr. Wily за решетку! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
